column5: It’s been a long time between posts.   Life has been pretty busy and I haven’t had a ton of fun time I did however just purchase a new to me ATV.  A 2011 Yamaha Grizzly 550.  Had her out last weekend on the trails by my brothers cottage and I think I am hooked! Andrew
I love my 2018 Outlander Max XT 570 for the snow!  Kimpex Click N Go 2 plow for the win cost and quality wise!
That looks like a twin to my '09 550.  Excellent reliable machine, never been back to the dealer, one battery and a set of tires.
Thanks all! so far so good.   My brother bought a newer 750 Grizzly in the fall and I was impressed.  Just started watching kijiji and Facebook and found this one cheers Andrew
Tough to go wrong with a Yam ATV. I've got a 05 Kodiak 450..... great bikes. Congrats and enjoy
My knees keep telling me to buy buy buy,but no place to store. Nice ride.
Congrats. I have 09 Grizzly 700, bought it 4 years ago used. It is serving me well.
Thanks all.  Heading out again this weekend.  Need to find some places to atv in for fishing this summer, combine 2 passions! Andrew
